roundToNearest(Timepoint, Timepoint.TYPE) - Method in interface com.mojtaba.materialdatetimepicker.time.TimePickerController
Will round the given Timepoint to the nearest valid Timepoint given the following restrictions: - TYPE.HOUR, it will just round to the next valid point, possible adjusting minutes and seconds - TYPE.MINUTE, it will round to the next valid point, without adjusting the hour, but possibly adjusting the seconds - TYPE.SECOND, it will round to the next valid point, only adjusting the seconds
